StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Cancer Risk Estimates Related to Susceptibility Genes (CARRIERS)

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: Collaborators providing samples: Christine B. Ambrosone, PhD; Song Yao, PhD for WCHS, Hoda Anton-Culver, PhD for UCIBCS, Paul Auer, PhD; Sara Lindstroem, PhD on behalf of WHI, Leslie Bernstein, PhD; Susan Neuhausen, PhD on behalf of CTS, Peter Kraft, ScD on behalf of NHS and NHS2, Mia Gaudet, PhD; Alpa V. Patel, PhD on behalf of CPSII and CPS3, Christopher Haiman, ScD for MEC, Esther M. John, PhD for NC-BCFR, Tuya Pal, MD for BEST, Julie R. Palmer, ScD for BWHS, Dale P. Sandler, PhD; Jack A. Taylor, MD, PhD for SISTER, Clarice Weinberg, PhD for Two Sister, Amy Trentham-Dietz, PhD for WWHS, Celine M. Vachon, PhD for MMHS, Fergus J. Couch, PhD for MCBCS. Sources of Support: This study was supported in part by NIH grants R01CA192393, R01CA225662, R35CA253187, an NIH Specialized Program of Research Excellence (SPORE) in Breast Cancer [P50CA116201], and the Breast Cancer Research Foundation. Additional support for the contributing studies was provided by NIH awards U01CA164974, R01CA098663, R01CA100598, R01CA185623, P01CA151135, R01CA097396, P30CA16056, U01CA164973, U01CA164920, R01CA204819, R01CA77398, U01CA199277, P30CA014520, U01CA82004, R01CA047147, R01CA067264, UM1CA186107, P01CA87969, R01CA49449 U01CA176726 and R01CA67262; NHLBI contracts (HHSN268201600018C, HHSN268201600001C, HHSN268201600002C, HHSN268201600003C, and HHSN268201600004C); NIEHS intramural awards (Z01-ES044005, Z01-ES049033 and Z01-ES102245); American Cancer Society; Susan G Komen for the Cure (JRP, SMD, 2SISTER), Breast Cancer Research Foundation (FJC, CBA, JMW, SMD, KLN), Karin Grunebaum Cancer Research Foundation (JRP), the University of Wisconsin-Madison Office of the Vice Chancellor for Research and Graduate Education (ATD), The California Breast Cancer Research Fund (contract 97-10500), California Department of Public Health. The UCI Breast Cancer Study (UCIBCS) component of this research was supported by the NIH [CA58860, CA92044] and the Lon V Smith Foundation [LVS39420].

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (COL, NPU, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-COL-NPU-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s). Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.
Requestor must provide a letter of collaboration with the primary study investigator(s). The letter of collaboration for this study is the "Black Women’s Health Study (BWHS) Data Request and Data Use Agreement for Collaborative Analysis” form from Boston University. A blank copy can be found at the end of the dataset's Data Use Certification Agreement (see dbGaP study page). Requestor must provide this signed form documenting Boston University approval. Please contact Principal Investigator Julie Palmer, ScD (jpalmer@bu.edu) to set up collaborative agreement.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical
ConsentGroup.name: HMB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, IRB, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-IRB-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Breast and Ovarian cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BROC
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Breast and Ovarian cancer.
Data can NOT be used for general methods development research

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-IRB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
Only full or expedited IRB approvals will be accepted. Use of the WHI data to conduct non-genetic research is prohibited. WHI data may not be used to investigate individual pedigree structures, individual participant genotypes, perceptions of racial/ethnic identity, variables that could be considered as stigmatizing an individual or group, or issues such as non-maternity. Users acknowledge that American Indian participants were self-identified and were dwelling in urban areas and are not representative of the diverse American Indian population across the United States. Users agree to not use the data to infer tribal status or affiliation.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.
Only full or expedited IRB approvals will be accepted. Use of the WHI data to conduct non-genetic research is prohibited. WHI data may not be used to investigate individual pedigree structures, individual participant genotypes, perceptions of racial/ethnic identity, variables that could be considered as stigmatizing an individual or group, or issues such as non-maternity. Users acknowledge that American Indian participants were self-identified and were dwelling in urban areas and are not representative of the diverse American Indian population across the United States. Users agree to not use the data to infer tribal status or affiliation.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cancer.
